name: Buttons and Scissors
summary: Cut off the sewing buttons in the logic game Buttons and Scissors! To cut off the buttons, select two or more buttons of the same color. You can select buttons only on the same horizontal, vertical or diagonal line. Cut off all the buttons from the scrap of denim to complete the level.
info:
• 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: http://www.kyworks.com/
